stories.text: Feels like the Iron Curtain is coming down once again, something you would have thought the information age would have retired.  We in the west read the news... wondering if anyone in Russia can speak to how the invasion of Ukraine is being viewed on the "street"?  Are there any scenes of rising unrest against Putin or is the "state" view still being believed?
stories.title: Ask HN: How is the Ukraine war being viewed within Russia?
TikTok has changed the way we consume war
Ukraine ask satellite-firms to public-share real-time Images of Russian Invasion
Steam Deck emulation can handle Persona 5 and more
SEC Says BitConnect's Indicted Founder Has Fled to India

stories.text:
Isn't it time to disrupt the hearing aid industry, which is pretty scammy?

Seems like with modern technology, you could leapfrog all these existing, expensive, old hardware solutions.

Or am I missing someone already doing that?
stories.title: Ask HN: Hearing Aid Industry Disruption

stories.text: Is it worth the time and effort to keep it up and running or dump the ancient system and get myself a new one?
stories.title: Ask HN: I have an old 32-bit laptop. Should I keep it up and running?
